api_url.description: The Webex Teams API URL, i.e. https://webexapis.com/v1/messages

http_config.description: HTTP client configuration. You must use this configuration to supply the bot token as part of the HTTP `Authorization` header.

room_id.description: The ID of the Webex Teams room where to send the messages

send_resolved.description: SendResolved controls notify about resolved alerts.
